name: tb-ax3
comment: The third of three axioms in the Tarski-Bernays axiom system. This axiom, along with ~ ax-mp , ~ tb-ax1 , and ~ tb-ax2 , can be used to derive any theorem or rule that uses only ` -> ` . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 16-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
